name: Demo SMP Training/Inference
title: Segmentation Models Training and Inference
description: Segmentation models training and inference plugin.
author: Gauhar Bains (gauhar.bains@labshare.org), Najib Ishaq (najib.ishaq@axleinfo.com), Madhuri Vihani (madhuri.vihani@nih.gov), Benjamin Houghton (benjamin.houghton@axleinfo.com)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: inferenceMode
inputs.description: 'active' or 'inactive' for whether to run in inference mode.

inputs.name: imagesInferenceDir
inputs.description: Collection containing images on which to run inference.

inputs.name: inferencePattern
inputs.description: Filename pattern for images on which to run inference.

inputs.name: pretrainedModel
inputs.description: Path to a model that was previously trained with this plugin. If starting fresh, you must instead provide: 'modelName', 'encoderBase', 'encoderVariant', 'encoderWeights', and 'optimizerName'. See the README for available options.

inputs.name: modelName
inputs.description: Model architecture to use. Required if starting fresh.

inputs.name: encoderBase
inputs.description: The name of the base encoder to use.

inputs.name: encoderVariant
inputs.description: The name of the specific variant to use.

inputs.name: encoderWeights
inputs.description: The name of the pretrained weights to use.

inputs.name: optimizerName
inputs.description: Name of optimization algorithm to use for training the model. Required if starting fresh.

inputs.name: batchSize
inputs.description: Size of each batch for training. If left unspecified, we use the maximum possible based on memory constraints.

inputs.name: imagesTrainDir
inputs.description: Collection containing images to use for training.

inputs.name: labelsTrainDir
inputs.description: Collection containing labels, i.e. the ground-truth, for the training images.

inputs.name: trainPattern
inputs.description: Filename pattern for training images and labels.

inputs.name: imagesValidDir
inputs.description: Collection containing images to use for validation.

inputs.name: labelsValidDir
inputs.description: Collection containing labels, i.e. the ground-truth, for the validation images.

inputs.name: validPattern
inputs.description: Filename pattern for validation images and labels.

inputs.name: device
inputs.description: Which device to use for the model

inputs.name: checkpointFrequency
inputs.description: How often to save model checkpoints

inputs.name: lossName
inputs.description: Name of loss function to use.

inputs.name: maxEpochs
inputs.description: Maximum number of epochs for which to continue training the model.

inputs.name: patience
inputs.description: Maximum number of epochs to wait for model to improve.

inputs.name: minDelta
inputs.description: Minimum improvement in loss to reset patience.

outputs.name: outputDir
outputs.description: In training mode, this contains the trained model and checkpoints. In inference mode, this contains the output labels.

ui.title: inferenceMode
